title.rendered: Yealink Entry Level IP Phone (With PoE) SKU: SIP-T21P E2

content.rendered:
The Yealink T21P E2 sets a new standard in the entry-level IP phone market. By making use of high quality materials and offering features such as a large 132×64 pixel LCD backlight display, dual 10/100Mbps Ethernet ports and up to 2 SIP accounts the Yealink T21P E2 is the ideal, cost effective, IP phone for any office environment. Additionally the Yealink T21P E2 supports power over Ethernet (PoE) to help centralise your instillation and improve ease of deployment.

 

Features:

  • 2.3″ 132×64 Pixel Back Light LCD Display
  • 2 x Ethernet Ports 10/100 POE Support
  • 2 x SIP Accounts
  • 2 x Line Keys
  • Wall-mountable
  • High Definition Voice Support
